attributes.additional_details:
As an A level student, I find it unfair that we endure months of stress for the only thing in return to be our grade paper. We should have our exams returned to us so we can see where the marks have been given and to see if our grade is justified. It is highly frustrating when a re-sit is needed and you don't know where you went wrong last time!
Along with the exam results, the exam board should return the papers and I believe the government can pressure them into doing so.
